name: Bulldozer: Operation Mars
description:
Stranded on Mars, the long lost ship must traverse the red rocky surface and face off against all odds and enemies. The forces of Mars bring their firey red rage, and you must find any way to survive. Good luck, you'll need it.

The game may take 2/3 seconds to load

Your controls

Arrows/WASD: Movement

Space: Shoot

R & T: Switch Weapon

Good Luck!

Audio:

Background audio created by Alexander Blu 

Song: Trap music instrumental
